text: Mário José dos Reis Emiliano (23 May 1957 – 15 June 2020), commonly known as Marinho, was a Brazilian professional footballer and assistant manager, He played for Bangu. He played as a right winger. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1976 Summer Olympics. He was born in Belo Horizonte, Brazil. Marinho died on 15 June 2020 in Belo Horizonte from pancreatitis caused by prostate cancer, aged 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1957 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Footballers from Belo Horizonte Category:Olympians for Brazil
title: Marinho (footballer, born 1957)
